__e: Lux,I know that I wasn't there to protect you.
Well, funny thing, Mr Lux, I don't want to see everyone in this room dead because some idiot thinks his pride is more important.
Lux, I... I can't show you that I care about you like normal people can.
No, Lux, that's just some excuse that he gave to Abby.
When Lux first showed up back in our lives, I did not peg you for mom material, and I don't think that you pegged you for mom material, but you... you have stepped up in every way.
This is seriously screwed up, Lux, you know that?
